response.overview: A Fun-D-Mental Film where energy is everywhere. Fun-D-Mmental filmmaking is a genre of my making. The 'D' stands for 'Documentary,' the 'MENTAL' stands for 'experiMENTAL,' and the 'FUN' stands for the thrilling experience I create for the audience--for 'JUICE' is all of these things. And the word 'fundamental' is a variant on my expression of 'pure cinema.' A specialist in filming moving textures from real world situations, I journeyed to Las Vegas with an HD camera to capture pure energy--JUICE. With my paints--the images--I synthesized a digital dream and scored the avant-garde electronic music soundtrack to match the intensity and inner-stellar beauty of the piece. 'JUICE' is singular, unforgettable, and visceral in every way.
response.title: Juice
